scripts.release:beta: npm test && npm run build && npm publish --tag=beta
scripts.release:patch: npm run test:badges && npm run build && npm version patch -m 'Creating new release %s' && git push && git push --tags && npx github-release-notes@0.17.1 release
scripts.release:minor: npm run test:badges && npm run build && npm version minor -m 'Creating new release %s' && git push && git push --tags && npx github-release-notes@0.17.1 release
scripts.release:major: npm run test:badges && npm run build && npm version major -m 'Creating new major release %s' && git push && git push --tags && npx github-release-notes@0.17.1 release
